remarks: Inductively transfer a property to the integers if it holds for zero and passes between adjacent integers in either direction.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Oct-2014.)
statement:
zindbi.1 $e |- ( y e. ZZ -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
zindbi.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
zindbi.3 $e |- ( x = ( y + 1 ) -> ( ph <-> ch ) ) $.
zindbi.4 $e |- ( x = 0 -> ( ph <-> th ) ) $.
zindbi.5 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ta ) ) $.
zindbi $p |- ( A e. ZZ -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
$d ta x $.
$d th x $.
